Description:
When users click the login button on the homepage, no action occurs. The button appears but doesn't trigger the login process.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Navigate to login page.
# Enter valid username and password.
# Click the "Login" button.
Expected Result: User should be logged in and redirected to their profile.
Actual Result: Nothing happens when clicking the login button.

Environment:

* Browser: Chrome 122.0
* OS: Windows 10
Develop backend functionality for user login process
Create UI design for user registration page according to style guid
